titles.title: CASE LOAD Act of 2023
CASE LOAD Act of 2023
Creating Additional Seats to Ease Legally Overburdened Adjudicatorsâ€™ Dockets Act of 2023
To authorize additional district judges for the district court for the eastern district of California.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Creating Additional Seats to Ease Legally Overburdened Adjudicators' Dockets Act of 2023 or the CASE LOAD Act of 2023
This bill increases the total number of U.S. district court judgeships for the Eastern District of California. Specifically, the bill incrementally increases the number from 6 to 11 by 2029.
